group_1.textLeft: The Met Clan reveres a mysterious god…
The White Beast God…
…who refers to himself as Kyubey.

group_1.textRight: (They know about the god I contracted with…!)

group_1.textLeft: And we were told…
…that the Met Clan brings girls to this god@to make a contract.
The girl gets a wish in exchange for contracting.
However…
It's always gotta be something that benefits@the clan's goals.

group_1.narration: "It is…to keep us…@under the protection of the dynasty."

group_1.textLeft: These girls were forced to make wishes…
…to create a firm foundation for the prosperity@of Egypt’s dynasties.
You certainly weren't the first.
Your clan has had secret ties and curried favor@with the pharaohs for ages now…
…So we were told.
Not only that, each girl was given the power@and duty of slaying the Evil Gods.
In doing so, the girls could sustain their power.
But the Met Clan would not let their@responsibilities end there..
The girls were presented to the royal family@to act as the pharaoh's retainers,
and the power they gained was to be used@solely for the pharaoh's benefit…
…Am I correct?
To sum it all up…
The Met Clan has girls contract with the White@Beast God and make wishes for the dynasty.
The girls gain power and are tasked with@the mission of overcoming the Evil Gods.
The Met Clan sends them to the royal family,
where they are forced to use their power@for the pharaoh and pharaoh alone.
And this has been going on for ages…
The girls have no life of their own. Their only@purpose is to give themselves to the dynasty…
And you're one of those girls, aren't you?
…And there's one other thing we were told.

group_1.narration: "The beauty and wits that had Caesar@and Antonius tied to her whims@were not inherent."
"All of it was given to her from the girls@devoted to her service…"
"That woman…is a sham of a pharaoh…!"
